subject: Fwd: A shipment from order #SSN4465 is on the way
description_text:
Hello!

Please help! I have ordered the gear shifter + 2 VAM Pro motors, one box arrived today by DPD and it contained only the gear shifter!!!!

In the box there wasn't even room for the motors because of the plastic safety filling, so I think the motors are in a different box but I received only one box!

What should I do? Can you please check with DPD too? In the meantime I contact them too!


Thank you!
Regards,
Peter

conversations.body_text:
My order number is: ORDER #SSN4465

I can see that the motors haven't been sent yet? Only confirmed?

Can you please update when you'll send the motors? I don't understand why I haven't received them!

￼

Thank you
Peter

>

Hi Cuccok,    The motors are shipped in a separate package. I will check the shipping status for you today. Due to the peak season, order processing has been delayed, and we sincerely apologize for this. We will handle your order as quickly as possible and keep you updated.
